definitions.definition: forming a very small remnant of something that was once much larger or more noticeable.
examples: he felt a vestigial flicker of anger from last night
synonyms: lingering "he felt a vestigial flicker of anger from last night"

definitions.definition: (of an organ or part of the body) degenerate, rudimentary, or atrophied, having become functionless in the course of evolution.
examples: the vestigial wings of kiwis are entirely hidden
